englishTranslationText: Indeed	your	Lord’s	punishment	will	surely	take	place.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	tere	Rab	ka	‘aƶāb	zaroor	hona	hai

englishTranslationText: A	day	on	which	the	heavens	will	shake	with	a	visible	shaking.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	āasmān	hilna	sa	[hilna]	hileñge

englishTranslationText: And	the	mountains	will	move	with	a	visible	movement.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	pahād	chalna	sa	chalna	chaleñge

englishTranslationText: So	on	that	day,	ruin	is	for	those	who	deny.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi	hai

englishTranslationText: Those	who	are	playing	in	pursuits.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	jo	mashghale	meiñ	khel	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
englishTranslationText: A	day	when	they	will	be	pushed,	forcibly	shoved	towards	the	fire	of	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	Jahannam	ki	taraf	dhakka	dekar	dhakele	jāyeñ	ge

arabicText: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
englishTranslationText: This	is	the	fire,	which	you	used	to	deny!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	hai	woh	āag		jise	tum	jhutlāte	they

arabicText: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText: “So	is	this	magic,	or	are	you	unable	to	see?”
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kya	yeh	jādu	hai	ya	tumheiñ	soojhta	nahi

arabicText: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Enter	it	–	now	whether	you	patiently	
bear	it	or	are	impatient	-	it	is	the	same	for	
you;	for	you	is	a	recompense	only	for	
what	you	used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	meiñ	jāo	ab	chāhe	sabr	karo	ya	na	karo	
sab	tum	par	ek	sa	hai	tumheiñ	usi	ka	badla	
jo	tum	karte	they

englishTranslationText: Indeed	the	pious	are	in	Gardens	and	peace.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		parhez	gār	bāghoñ	aur	chain	meiñ	
haiñ

arabicText: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
Delighted	at	the	bestowal	of	their	Lord;	and	
their	Lord	has	saved	them	from	the	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Apne	Rab	ki	den	par	shād	shād	aur	unheiñ	
unke	Rab	ne	āag		ke	‘aƶāb		se	bachā	liya
